Record.ClassificationPath: Otorhinolaryngologic Diseases/Nose Diseases/Paranasal Sinus Diseases/Sinusitis/Sphenoid Sinusitis
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Nose Diseases/Paranasal Sinus Diseases/Sinusitis/Sphenoid Sinusitis
Respiratory Tract Diseases/Respiratory Tract Infections/Sinusitis/Sphenoid Sinusitis
Record.Description: Inflammation of the NASAL MUCOSA in the SPHENOID SINUS. Isolated sphenoid sinusitis is uncommon. It usually occurs in conjunction with other paranasal sinusitis.
